item.title: Golf with Olympians tees off
item.description: This event benefiting the MAG Foundation USA, was held at University Park Country Club.

item.title: Police arrest suspect for Bradenton homicide
item.description: Police arrest suspect for Bradenton homicide

item.title: Former NFL QB Mark Sanchez arrested on multiple charges after being stabbed in Indianapolis, reports say
item.description: Former NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez was reportedly stabbed early Saturday morning in downtown Indianapolis.

item.title: Three people accused of beating 57-year-old man to death for his food stamp card, police say
item.description: Three people in Texas are accused of beating a 57-year-old man to death for his EBT card, according to authorities.

item.title: Trump plans to federalize 300 troops in Illinois, as judge blocks a similar mobilization in Oregon
item.description: The Trump administration plans to federalize 300 Illinois National Guard troops, Democratic Gov. JB Pritzker said Saturday, marking the latest escalation of the president’s use of federal intervention in U.S. cities.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Sunday
item.description: Storms become more widespread for the late afternoon and evening

item.title: Mothers of 2 high schoolers killed while camping speak out after suspect arrested
item.description: The victims' mothers say the darkness of their murders will not overshadow the light and joy they brought to the world.

item.title: Farmer’s Market Sunday Forecast
item.description: Morning weather is perfect for our Farmers Markets

item.title: Man learning to read at 66 encourages others: ‘All you have to do is want to learn’
item.description: The 66-year-old has been working on his reading and writing skills through a literacy program run with the help of volunteers.

item.title: One killed, one hospitalized after crash in Charlotte County
item.description: Investigators say a 76-year-old man on a motorcycle tried passing a 64-year-old man on an E-bike, but they collided, sending the motorcycle driver airborne.

item.title: More Afternoon and Evening Thunderstorms
item.description: Sunday’s afternoon and evening thunderstorms are likely to be widespread, with dangerous lightning and some heavy downpours possible
